long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome Extension provides you with the ability to export any Move from the Movescount portal to a GPX file. This GPX file can be used either to import as a new route to the Movescount Route Planner or import it to any other platform, such as Basecamp or Google Earth.

To export a Move, navigate to any Move page in Movescount and click on the Export Move button on the right side of the browser's URL textfield. The GPX file should download immediately.
